entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
